about_the_game:
Gameplay
Players will need to cooperate with each other to collect treasure in the apocalypse while fighting against multiple supernatural creatures. You can sell the materials you collect, upgrade and strengthen your weapons after earning coins, and enter more dangerous scenarios in search of more valuable materials.

Background of the story
In the land of dusk, darkness is falling. 99% of Blue Star's territory was shrouded in a sudden mist, and under the mist, the gods forbade it. This fog has also become a hotbed for the mutation and evolution of countless creatures.

Only those Apostles of the End, chosen by the gods, can find a glimmer of hope in this cataclysm. But humanity never succumbs to fear and fate, they not only want to survive this catastrophe, but also desire to reveal the darkness behind the fog and break the dawn once and for all!

In response to this apocalyptic apocalypse, Bluestar's higher-ups have decided to assemble a special operations team of Apostles who can freely navigate through the mists to explore its eerie interior and gather precious resources. They are the only hope for humanity, heroes who are fearless in the face of fear.

This plan to deal with the catastrophe is a proclamation of the end, which is officially known as the "Daybreak Project".

But we prefer to call it ''Annihilation Plan''!

content_descriptors.notes: The game will appear: scary monsters, shooting death, zombie blood and other violent content

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: win10/win11
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo E6750 (2 * 2660) or equivalent | AMD Athlon 64 X2 Dual Core 6000+ (2 * 3000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or AMD Radeon R9 280
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: In the land of dusk, the night ends. You'll explore the apocalyptic world with your friends, scavenging for treasure and slaying countless Cthulhu-like monsters. At the end of the day, you'll be able to sell the items you find to strengthen your equipment!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Russian, Japanese, Simplified Chinese, Korean
